text: A Nintendo Switch in "Handheld Mode", with Joy-Con attached This is a list of video games for the Nintendo Switch video game console that have sold or shipped at least one million copies. As Nintendo shares the sales of their video games every quarter while most other publishers do not share sales figures per console, this list consists mostly of Nintendo-published titles. By June 30, 2020, over 406.67million total copies of games had been sold for the Switch. ==List== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" width="auto" |- !scope="col"| !scope="col"| Game !scope="col"| Copies sold !scope="col"| As of !scope="col"| Release date !scope="col"| Genre(s) !scope="col"| Developer(s) !scope="col"| Publisher(s) |- !scope="row" style="text-align:center;"| 1 | Mario Kart 8 Deluxe | million | | | Kart racing | Nintendo EPD | Nintendo |- !scope="row" style="text-align:center;"| 2 | Animal Crossing: New Horizons | million | | | Social simulation | Nintendo EPD | Nintendo |- !scope="row" style="text-align:center;"| 3 | Super Smash Bros.
